attributes.action: force MPs to pay back illegitimate expense claims made over the last 5 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPs should not be allowed to defraud the tax payer and get away with it. How can we, the British public trust our MPs to do right by the country if they cannot be trusted to behave with honor in their own affairs?  To regain moral authority, Parliament MUST put this right and the ONLY way acceptable to the British taxpayer would be to enforce MPs to pay back the amount they have claimed in illegitimate and fraudulent claims, including the Prime Minister himself.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
